> Toggle the CLI cursor

The cursor is [gracefully restored](https://github.com/sindresorhus/restore-cursor) if the process exits.

## API

### .show(stream?)

### .hide(stream?)

### .toggle(force?, stream?)

#### force

Useful for showing or hiding the cursor based on a boolean.

#### stream
